alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 3:40AM EST until February 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Higher amounts of 3 to 6 inches above 1500 feet in the Greens and Berkshires. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Connecticut, western Massachusetts and Green Mountains in southern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall totals will be lowest west of the high terrain of the Berkshires and Greens.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
